mapper.select: select * from metadata where id in (select relatedmetadataid from metadata_relation where metadataid=#{fatherProtocolMetadataId} and type='COMPOSITION') ORDER BY CAST(JSON_EXTRACT(attributes,'$.Index') AS UNSIGNED) limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from metadata_relation where metadataid=#{metadataid} and type='COMPOSITION'
select count(*) from metadata
select * from metadata where id in (select relatedmetadataid from metadata_relation where metadataid=#{metadataid} and type='COMPOSITION')
select * from metamodel_hierarchy where id in (select metamodelid from metadata where id=#{metadataid})
select id,name as label,IF((SELECT count(*) FROM metadata WHERE metamodelid=childmetamodelid)>0,'false','true') AS leaf from metadata_view_node where viewid=#{viewid};

select metadata.id as id,name as label,metamodelid,IF((SELECT count(*) FROM metadata_relation WHERE metadataid=metadata.id and type='COMPOSITION')>0,'false','true') AS leaf from metadata where metamodelid in (select childmetamodelid from metadata_view_node where id=#{id}) and id not in (select relatedmetadataid from metadata_relation where type='COMPOSITION');

select metadata.id as id,name as label,metamodelid,IF((SELECT count(*) FROM metadata_relation WHERE metadataid=metadata.id and type='COMPOSITION')>0,'false','true') AS leaf from metadata where id in (select relatedmetadataid from metadata_relation where metadataid=#{metadataid} and type='COMPOSITION');
select * from metamodel_datatype where metamodelid=#{metamodelidStr} ORDER BY id asc
select attributes from metadata_tank where id=#{tankidStr}
select * from metadata_tank where keyid=#{metadataidStr}

select t1.id as relationid,t2.id as targetmetadataid,t2.name as targetmetadataname,t2.description as description from metadata as t2 inner join (select id,relatedmetadataid from metadata_relation where metadataid=#{metadataId} and type='DEPENDENCY') t1 on t2.id = t1.relatedmetadataid

select t3.id as metadataid,t3.name as metadataname,t3.description as description from metadata as t3 where t3.metamodelid in (select t2.relatedmetamodelid from metamodel_relation as t2 where t2.metamodelid in (select t1.metamodelid from metadata as t1 where t1.id=#{metadataId}) and t2.type='DEPENDENCY') and t3.id not in (select t4.relatedmetadataid from metadata_relation as t4 where t4.metadataid=#{metadataId} and t4.type='DEPENDENCY');
select * from metadata where name like "%"#{key}"%" or description like "%"#{key}"%" order by id limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize};

select t2.id as metadataid,t2.name as metadataname ,t2.description as description from metadata as t2 where t2.id in (select t1.relatedmetadataid from metadata_relation as t1 where t1.metadataid=#{metadataId} and t1.type='COMPOSITION') and t2.metamodelid=#{medamodelId};
select id as metadataid,name as metadataname from metadata where metamodelid=#{metaModelId};
mapper.update: UPDATE metadata SET updatetime=#{UPDATETIME}, version=#{VERSION}, attributes=#{ATTRIBUTES} WHERE id = #{ID};
UPDATE metadata SET name=#{NAME}, description=#{DESCRIPTION}, updatetime=#{UPDATETIME}, version=#{VERSION} WHERE id = #{ID};
mapper.select: select name from metamodel_datatype where metamodelid=#{metaModelId};
